metadata.title: CVE-2024-46835 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: Fix smatch static checker warningadev->gfx.imu.funcs could be NULL
